Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Okay so I need to explain this BPMN diagram the user provided Let me start by reading through the pseudo BPMN again to make sure I understand the flow

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The process starts with a customer request then theres an XOR gateway to check if its standard or custom Depending on that different tasks branch out

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First the standard path goes through validation then parallel checks credit and inventory then calculates delivery date

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The custom path goes to feasibility analysis then another XOR to see if its feasible If yes prepare a quote if no send rejection

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Then theres another XOR after both paths to check if approval is needed If yes get manager approval then another XOR to see if approval is granted If granted generate invoice if not re evaluate and loop back The no approval path just goes straight to generate invoice then send confirmation

Text: For the standard path B1 is standard validation which might be checking basic stuff like form completion or eligibility Then the AND gateway means both credit and inventory checks run in parallel The join after that ensures both are done before proceeding to calculate delivery So the delivery date depends on those checks passing
